Skills

{{ skill.name }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProfileService } from 'src/app/_services/profile.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills', templateUrl: './skills.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills.component.scss'] }) export class SkillsComponent implements OnInit{ skills:any constructor(private profileService:ProfileService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.skills = this.profileService.getSkills() } }
